=== Problems ===
+
=== Known problems ===
*A Live CD/DVD created from a system with installed proprietary ATI or Nvidia drivers, when booted, will not load these drivers [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?topic=3430.0] <br>
*A Live CD/DVD created from a system with installed proprietary ATI or Nvidia drivers, when booted, will not load these drivers [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?topic=3430.0] <br>
*When running from a [[Wubi (Ubuntu)|wubi]] installation, remastersys seems to enter in an "infinite loop" when trying to create an iso from that system. [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=a393521c87cc4bb739e59706268383cb&topic=2224.0]
*When running from a [[Wubi (Ubuntu)|wubi]] installation, remastersys seems to enter in an "infinite loop" when trying to create an iso from that system. [http://loscompanion.com/forums/index.php?PHPSESSID=a393521c87cc4bb739e59706268383cb&topic=2224.0]
